messages.content:
Hey there! 👋 I'm CJ, your AI Customer Experience Officer. I'm here to handle your support operations autonomously and turn your customer data into growth insights.

Is this our first time chatting? I want to make sure I give you the right experience.

I'm still in beta (think "really smart intern who never sleeps"), but I'm already helping merchants save 8-12 hours per week on support while recovering thousands in revenue through better customer experiences.

Here's what I do:
- Handle 60-80% of support tickets without you lifting a finger
- Turn angry customers into happy ones (and prevent those nasty reviews)
- Spot patterns in your support data that unlock growth opportunities
- Work 24/7 so you can actually take time off

What's your name? I like to know who I'm working with! 

Once we get you connected, I'll analyze your store and support patterns to show you exactly how I can help your business grow. Sound good?
